generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in the median.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- rider: Two riders on bicycles are visible crossing the street in the middle distance.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road and some are visible in the distance.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, including one red light facing the camera.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including stop signs, directional signs, and regulatory signs.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible in the median and along the sidewalks.
